amendment.description: To provide deadlines for the issuance of certain regulations and to require a GAO report on the implementation of the clinical trial registration and reporting requirements under the Public Health Service Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2129 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2129 proposed by Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S3490-3491, S3507; text: CR S3490-3491) To provide deadlines for the issuance of certain regulations and to require a GAO report on the implementation of the clinical trial registration and reporting requirements under the Public Health Service Act.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2129 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2129 proposed by Senator Grassley.
